mapper.insert: insert into comment (image_url, user_name, comment_time, content, category, academic_id, parent_id) values (#{imageUrl}, #{userName}, #{commentTime}, #{content}, #{category}, #{academicId}, #{parentId})
mapper.select: select * from comment c where c.parent_id=#{parentId} order by c.comment_time desc
select * from comment c where c.parent_id=#{id} order by c.comment_time desc
select * from comment c where c.parent_id=#{childId} order by c.comment_time desc
